org.apache.reef.runtime.common.driver

Class DriverStatusManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.reef.runtime.common.driver.DriverStatusManager

  • public final class DriverStatusManager
extends Object
    Manages the Driver's status.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNumPreviousContainers() 
      int getNumRecoveredContainers() 
      boolean isShuttingDownOrFailing() 
      void onComplete()
      Perform a clean shutdown of the Driver.
      void oneContainerRecovered()
      Indicate that this Driver has re-established the connection with one more Evaluator of a previous run.
      void onError(Throwable exception)
      End the Driver with an exception.
      void onInit()
      Changes the driver status to INIT and sends message to the client about the transition.
      void onRunning()
      Changes the driver status to RUNNING and sends message to the client about the transition.
      void sendJobEndingMessageToClient(Optional<Throwable> exception)
      Sends the final message to the Driver.

      Set the number of containers to expect still active from a previous execution of the Driver in a restart situation.

    • Method Detail

      • onInit

        public void onInit()
        Changes the driver status to INIT and sends message to the client about the transition.

      • onRunning

        public void onRunning()
        Changes the driver status to RUNNING and sends message to the client about the transition. If the driver is in status 'PRE_INIT', this first calls onInit();

      • onError

        public void onError(Throwable exception)
        End the Driver with an exception.
        Parameters:
        exception -

      • onComplete

        public void onComplete()
        Perform a clean shutdown of the Driver.

      • sendJobEndingMessageToClient

        public void sendJobEndingMessageToClient(Optional<Throwable> exception)
        Sends the final message to the Driver. This is used by DriverRuntimeStopHandler.onNext().
        Parameters:
        exception -

      • setRestartCompleted

        public void setRestartCompleted()
        Indicate that the Driver restart is complete. It is meant to be called exactly once during a restart and never during the ininital launch of a Driver.

      • getNumPreviousContainers

        public int getNumPreviousContainers()
        Returns:
        the number of Evaluators expected to check in from a previous run.

      • setNumPreviousContainers

        public void setNumPreviousContainers(int num)
        Set the number of containers to expect still active from a previous execution of the Driver in a restart situation. To be called exactly once during a driver restart.
        Parameters:
        num -

      • getNumRecoveredContainers

        public int getNumRecoveredContainers()
        Returns:
        the number of Evaluators from a previous Driver that have checked in with the Driver in a restart situation.

      • oneContainerRecovered

        public void oneContainerRecovered()
        Indicate that this Driver has re-established the connection with one more Evaluator of a previous run.

      • isShuttingDownOrFailing

        public boolean isShuttingDownOrFailing()
